name: Saola Cannon Knit Recycled Vegan Shoes - Men's
description:
Sustainable summer shoes for cruising around town. These eco-friendly shoes contains 3–4 plastic bottles per pair, and the foam sole is made from pond scum mixed with EVA foam for a cushiony ride.Breathable uppers made from recycled PET.Organic cotton laces.Natural cork and Bloom Foam™ insole for comfort.Super-lightweight Bloom Foam outsole provides protection and cushion.Bloom is the world's first plant-based performance-driven foam, made with algae biomass.

        Sustainability
